item.title: [REQ] Blank skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“jjones10, post:9, topic:293108”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=387300.msg2901321#msg2901321 date=1249532928]

i’ll do it. gimme a minute[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2009, 09:33:25 pm[/size][hr]Here we go http://uppit.com/v/S5VAKQ4O

Blank Skillcape

Heh, yea to be honest i made my own blank skillcapes and used amulet animation, LOL. I have a team minigame i am working on though, but if one player managed to get through it himself, it will give him the skillcape as a prize.

@THIS POST - To be honest i never had the patience for giving someone a skillcape edit, since they just keep comming back.
[/quote]
Yeah, ya know i thought about how lazy i was and decided to get off my ass and do something that actually BENIFITS this communtity.[/quote]
Heh, what we really need to do is start grabbing shit from other communities and get our asses flamed for it. Just so this community can advance a little lol. Would help us tromendously (not sure if i spelled that right).

Read full topic
